name: variable-conversion
description:
一个强大的变量名转换插件，支持右键菜单、快捷键、状态栏等多种方式使用，支持小驼峰、大驼峰(帕斯卡)、下划线(蛇形)、中划线(连字符/脊柱式)、空格分隔、点分隔、全小写、全大写等常用命名方式(及组合)转换。 
A powerful variable naming conversion extension. You can use it through the editer menu, shortcut keys and bottom bar. Support camel, pascal, snake, kebab(spinal), space, dot, lower, upper case, and more.

commands.title: 变量转换
小驼峰(驼峰)命名 (Camel Case) [ fooBar ]
大驼峰(帕斯卡)命名 (Pascal Case) [ FooBar ]
下划线(蛇形)命名 (Snake Case) [ foo_bar ]
下划线(蛇形) + 全大写命名 (Snake Upper Case) [ FOO_BAR ]
下划线(蛇形) + 大驼峰(帕斯卡)命名 (Snake Pascal Case) [ Foo_Bar ]
下划线(蛇形) + 小驼峰(驼峰)命名 (Snake Camel Case) [ foo_Bar ]
中划线(连字符/脊柱式)命名 (Kebab/Spinal Case) [ foo-bar ]
中划线(连字符/脊柱式) + 全大写命名 (Kebab Upper Case) [ FOO-BAR ]
中划线(连字符/脊柱式) + 大驼峰(帕斯卡)命名 (Kebab Pascal Case) [ Foo-Bar ]
中划线(连字符/脊柱式) + 小驼峰(驼峰)命名 (Kebab Camel Case) [ foo-Bar ]
空格分隔命名 (Space Case) [ foo bar ]
空格分隔 + 全大写命名 (Space Upper Case) [ FOO BAR ]
空格分隔 + 大驼峰(帕斯卡)命名 (Space Pascal Case) [ Foo Bar ]
空格分隔 + 小驼峰(驼峰)命名 (Space Camel Case) [ foo Bar ]
点分隔命名 (Dot Case) [ foo bar ]
点分隔 + 全大写命名 (Dot Upper Case) [ FOO BAR ]
点分隔 + 大驼峰(帕斯卡)命名 (Dot Pascal Case) [ Foo Bar ]
点分隔 + 小驼峰(驼峰)命名 (Dot Camel Case) [ foo Bar ]
全小写 (Lower Case) [ foobar ]
全大写 (Upper Case) [ FOOBAR ]

variable-conversion.disableFormat.markdownDescription:
Define which formats are disabled.

定义哪些格式是禁用的

If you find the following configuration troublesome, you can also edit this configuration item in `settings.json`:

若您感觉以下配置比较麻烦，也可以选择在 `settings.json` 中编辑：

`"variable-conversion.disableFormat": [ ... ],`

[Edit in settings.json (在 settings.json 中编辑)](command:workbench.action.openSettingsJson)

You may need to *restart extension host* or *reload window* after configuration to take full effect (either):

配置后，您可能需要*重启扩展宿主*，或*重启当前窗口*才可使该配置完全生效（二选一即可）:

[Restart Extension Host (重启扩展宿主)](command:workbench.action.restartExtensionHost), [Reload Window (重启当前窗口)](command:workbench.action.reloadWindow)

variable-conversion.circularConversionFo.title: 定义循环转换快捷键的目标格式排序
variable-conversion.circularConversionFo.markdownDescription:
Defines the destination format ordering of the circular conversion shortcut, separated by commas.

 定义循环转换快捷键的目标格式排序，以英文逗号分隔

 Target formats that are not in the following configuration list will appear last in the following custom order in the default order.

不在以下配置列表中的目标格式，将按照默认顺序排在以下自定义顺序最后

 🌟Lower Case 全小写命名: `lower_case`(全小写), `snake_case`(下划线), `kebab_case`(连字符), `space_case`(空格), `dot_case`(点)

 🌟Upper Case 全大写命名: `upper_case`(全大写), `snake_upper_case`(下划线), `kebab_upper_case`(连字符), `space_upper_case`(空格), `dot_upper_case`(点)

 🌟Pascal Case 大驼峰命名: `pascal_case`(大驼峰), `snake_pascal_case`(下划线), `kebab_pascal_case`(连字符), `space_pascal_case`(空格), `dot_pascal_case`(点)

 🌟Camel Case 小驼峰命名: `camel_case`(小驼峰), `snake_camel_case`(下划线), `kebab_camel_case`(连字符), `space_camel_case`(空格), `dot_camel_case`(点)

🐳Default value 默认值: `camel_case, snake_case, pascal_case, kebab_case, space_case, dot_case, snake_upper_case, kebab_upper_case, space_upper_case, dot_upper_case, snake_pascal_case, kebab_pascal_case, space_pascal_case, dot_pascal_case, snake_camel_case, kebab_camel_case, space_camel_case, dot_camel_case, lower_case, upper_case`

 If you find the following configuration troublesome, you can also edit this configuration item in `settings.json`. 若您感觉以下配置比较麻烦，也可以选择在 `settings.json` 中编辑: `"variable-conversion.circularConversionFormatOrder": "...",` [Edit in settings.json (在 settings.json 中编辑)](command:workbench.action.openSettingsJson)
variable-conversion.circularConversionFo.default: camel_case, snake_case, pascal_case, kebab_case, space_case, dot_case, snake_upper_case, kebab_upper_case, space_upper_case, dot_upper_case, snake_pascal_case, kebab_pascal_case, space_pascal_case, dot_pascal_case, snake_camel_case, kebab_camel_case, space_camel_case, dot_camel_case, lower_case, upper_case

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
